posts.post_content:
I heard rumors that Rancor was supposed to be a 2 or 3-cost spell, and the missing ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol) or ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol) was a typo (like Patheitc on [Wit's End](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wit's End), or the [Serendib Efreet](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Serendib Efreet)'s with the [Ifh-Bíff Efreet](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ifh-Bíff Efreet) art and border).   
  
If you look at the cycle of other auras from Urza's Legacy (oh, what a surprise: a rigged card from the Urza block) such as [Sluggishness](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sluggishness), [Cessation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cessation), [Sleeper's Guile](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sleeper's Guile) and [Slow Motion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Slow Motion). you'll see the resemblance.   
  
If you look at them, each of them give a creature something: [Can't Attack](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Cessation), [Can't Block](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sluggishness), [Gains Fear](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=sleepersguile), or [Pay ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol) or sacrifice this](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=slowmotion). Other than Sluggishness, each of them cost ![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol).   
  
That being said, I still think a ![2](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=2&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) +2/+0 trample enchantment that goes back to your hand is S... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
posts.html:
I heard rumors that Rancor was supposed to be a 2 or 3-cost spell, and the missing or was a typo (like Patheitc on Wit's End, or the Serendib Efreet's with the Ifh-Bíff Efreet art and border).

If you look at the cycle of other auras from Urza's Legacy (oh, what a surprise: a rigged card from the Urza block) such as Sluggishness, Cessation, Sleeper's Guile and Slow Motion. you'll see the resemblance.

If you look at them, each of them give a creature something: Can't Attack, Can't Block, Gains Fear, or Pay or sacrifice this. Other than Sluggishness, each of them cost .
